de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport

Class DefaultTransportAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.transport.DefaultTransportAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, TransportAttributes

    public class DefaultTransportAttributes
extends Object
implements TransportAttributes
    Default attributes for a TransportConnection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultTransportAttributes

        public DefaultTransportAttributes(String tId,
                          TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tProtocolIdentifier)
        Creates a DefaultTransportAttributes object with a given ID and the protocol type and version. Maximum message size and round trips are set to unknown.
        Parameters:
        tId - the connection ID from a TransportConnection
        tProtocolIdentifier - the protocol identifier from a TransportConnection

      • DefaultTransportAttributes

        public DefaultTransportAttributes(String tId,
                          TcgProtocolBindingIdentifier tProtocolIdentifier,
                          long maxMessageLength,
                          long maxMessageLengthPerIm,
                          long maxRoundTrips)
        Creates a DefaultTransportAttributes object with a given ID and the protocol type and version, as well as further important attributes.
        Parameters:
        tId - the connection ID from a TransportConnection
        tProtocolIdentifier - the protocol identifier from a TransportConnection
        maxMessageLength - the maximum full message length
        maxMessageLengthPerIm - the maximum message length of an IF-M message
        maxRoundTrips - the maximum round trips
